snippet: Programs at the federal, state and local levels typically come with strict requirements, but they can help pay for training employees and more.
abstract: Fashion Manufacturing Initiative is public-private program that offers matching financial grants to local manufacturers looking to upgrade their machinery or expand services; program, run by New York City Economic Development Corporation and Council of Fashion Designers of American, is aimed at supporting city's fashion manufacturing businesses.
